title: NASA observes huge meteoroid impact on Mars, discovers more ice on the Red Planet
description: The meteorite's impact exposed boulder-sized chunks of water ice in a surprising location on Mars

title: Amazon plans a new Project Kuiper factory to build as many as four internet satellites a day
description: Amazon is ramping up its operations with the goal of launching more than 3,000 broadband satellites into space

title: Office Corporate Vice President Joe Belfiore to leave Microsoft after 32 years
description: Microsoft veteran and Office VP Belfiore is retiring and leaving the current Office product line-up and strategy to a few key successors.

title: Closing the cultural and skills gaps in digital customer experiences
description: Tech professionals' roles need to expand as organizations rely on digital customer experiences for their bread and butter.

title: Zectron e-bike first look: A week-long rider with a lot of potential
description: Zectron's newest folding e-bike comes with shock absorbers and week-long battery life. There are a few kinks you should watch out for, though.

title: OpenSSL warns of critical security vulnerability with upcoming patch
description: We don't have the details yet, but we can safely say that come Nov. 1, everyone -- and I mean everyone -- will need to patch OpenSSL 3.x.

title: Your Android phone can notify you of an earthquake seconds before it happens. Here's how
description: Mini seismometers in Android phones act as a network of sensors to notify residents of an earthquake and give them a few seconds to prepare

title: How to stop spam messages on your iPhone in 60 seconds
description: It really only takes one minute to remove iPhone's most annoying annoyances: spam messages. Here's how you can stop them and do it fast.

title: Linus Torvalds bids 486 Linux adieu
description: It's been fun, but Linus Torvalds thinks it's time for 486 Linux to leave computers behind and go to museums.

title: Elon Musk promises not to make Twitter a 'free-for-all hellscape'
description: On the eve of the deadline for his $44 billion Twitter acquisition deal, Elon Musk is trying to reassure advertisers that he wants the platform to be 'warm and welcoming to all.'

title: How to remove background noise in Audacity for cleaner podcasts
description: Here's how to give your podcasts more professional production quality.

title: This car charger doubles as an emergency device
description: This is one of those tiny tools that you forget about -- until you need it.

title: Could Apple release a 16-inch iPad in 2023?
description: Apple may be developing a super-sized iPad, according to a report by The Information.

title: NASA funds space research to fight cancer on Earth
description: NASA-funded space radiation research led to the development of a test that could help identify and monitor certain types of cancer on Earth.

title: Coros Pod 2 first look review: Watch accessory to improve running data accuracy
description: Coros was one of the first to bring multi-GNSS dual-frequency capability to its watches, but it is not settling for satellite only tracking. The new Coros Pod 2 brings Effort Pace and improved accuracy to running workouts.

title: The 6 best rugged phones of 2022
description: A rugged phone can withstand shocks, drops, and rough elements -- and they're often cheaper than flagship phones. We analyzed the best rugged phones on the market.

title: Google Meet and Zoom Rooms to interoperate, Meet-certified Android devices on the way
description: Google delivers more flexibility for hybrid workplaces.

title: You can buy ten pairs of these amazing earbuds for the price of Apple's AirPods Pro
description: Not everyone wants to drop $250 on a set of earbuds. Here are some awesome earbuds that are a fraction of the price.

title: COROS POD 2 first look review: Watch accessory to improve running data accuracy
description: COROS was one of the first to bring multi-GNSS dual-frequency capability to its watches, but it is not settling for satellite only tracking. The new COROS POD 2 brings EffortPace and improved accuracy to running workouts.

title: The 5 best OLED TVs of 2022
description: An OLED TV can offer superior detailing, contrast, color volume, and overall picture quality. We rounded up the best OLED TVs on the market -- and Samsung is a new contender.

title: Google's new service helps Web3 developers build for blockchain-based platforms
description: Ethereum will be the first blockchain platform supported by Google Cloud's new Blockchain Node Engine, a fully managed node-hosting service.

title: Winkeo-C FIDO2, hands on: A reliable and affordable USB-C security key
description: Add FIDO2 to devices that don't have built-in security hardware. There's a little extra setup work, but the price is competitive.

title: These cybersecurity vulnerabilities are most popular with hackers right now - have you patched them?
description: Cybersecurity researchers detail some of the security flaws that are most associated with attacks in recent times. One is years old.

title: Next Windows 10/11 Patch Tuesday fixes Microsoft's botched vulnerable driver blocklist
description: Microsoft addresses an issue preventing Windows 10's vulnerable driver blocklist from being updated with new vulnerable drivers.

title: Programming languages: Why Meta is moving its Android apps from Java to Kotlin
description: Here's what Meta's developers have learned from moving their code base from the Java programming language over to Kotlin.

title: Woot's sale on travel tech includes discount Chromebooks
description: Prices on travel tech including Chromebooks, earbuds, and chargers have been reduced by up to 70%.

title: Samsung heir Jay Y Lee appointed as executive chairman of tech giant
description: The Samsung heir has taken the top position of South Korea's largest technology conglomerate which remained vacant for two years since his father's death in 2020.

title: Samsung's profit drop in third quarter from weakening demand for memory chips
description: But the South Korean tech giant said it expects its annual revenue this year to be its highest to date thanks to expanded sales across the board.

title: SAS touts integration with Singapore toolkit to help operationalise responsible AI adoption
description: SAS Institute says the integration of its Viya platform with the software toolkit released by Monetary Authority of Singapore, aims to help financial institutions struggling to put into practice core principles governing the ethical and responsible use of artificial intelligence.
